description.value:
Allows user to adjust facial features at will, alterting shape and texture rapidly. Gain +10 to Disguise Tests. Poor Craftsmanship give a level of fatigue whenever a character changes their appearance. Good versions also change pigments and voice, granting +20 to Disguise Tests.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
